ðŸ“– Summary: NetScan Pro is an interactive Bash-based network scanning tool that offers live host discovery, port scanning, traceroute, and ping tests. It is designed for network administrators and security professionals, providing a user-friendly interface with colorful outputs and visual elements for network reconnaissance and security assessment.
